definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵

sentences.english: Donnot let the noise ofothernos opinions drown out your own inner voice.
sentences.chinese: 不要让他人的意见左右自身心坎的声响。

sentences.english: The good news rejoiced the cockles of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 这好消息使我从心坎里感到高兴。

sentences.english: You throw your smile into my heart.
sentences.chinese: 你把那微笑，投进我心坎。

sentences.english: Because I know in my heart, you are the only one for me.
sentences.chinese: 因为我很清楚在我的心坎里只有你的存在。

sentences.english: Memory is a sort of inner rumor.
sentences.chinese: 回想，是一种心坎的浮名。

sentences.english: Man's anger, blows woman's pit of the stomach, can devastate the towering big tree.
sentences.chinese: 男人的怒气，吹进女人的心坎，会摧残参天大树。

sentences.english: She was evidently impregnated with the idea of submission.
sentences.chinese: 服从的观念已深深刻在她的心坎上。

sentences.english: Even if I can't find its silhouette , still I can recall some recollection in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 即使见不着她的倩影，只须在心坎上留存一丝记忆。

sentences.english: Self-worth begins and ends within you.
sentences.chinese: 自我价值感开始并终止于你的心坎。

sentences.english: I'll hold the memory of you, my friend, in my heart forever.
sentences.chinese: 我将记得你，我的伴侣，永远记在心坎里。

sentences.english: I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
I'll hold the memory of you my friend in my heart forever.
sentences.chinese: 我将记得你，我的捏友，永远记在心坎里。

sentences.english: Passes into my heart and brain.
The cold blade cut down, deep into Brangwen's soul.
sentences.chinese: 冰冷的刀刃深深地砍在布兰文的心坎上。

sentences.english: Lost in a world she carries deep inside her.
sentences.chinese: 她在心坎深处躲得很深，迷失在世界里。

sentences.english: At noon, the sun with its gigantic gentle light into our heart.
sentences.chinese: 中午，太阳用它那轻柔地光照射进了我们的心坎。

definition: bottom tip of the heart/fig. innermost feelings/coll. my darling
one's breast/the pit of one's stomach
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
lit. to draw blood on the first prick (idiom)/fig. to hit the nail on the head
(to express one's) true feelings/what is on one's mind/secret mind
to hit the mark with a comment (idiom)/to say sth spot on
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
